entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 10.
